title: Textile, 1790s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Four different scenes; women gathering fruit, women setting fire to a boat, two men on a rocky promontory and older man and younger male and female couple at a table. The text in French under the last scene says' Telemachus, son of Ulysses'.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1790s.
1790s. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-259.
